name: HaccerHD
description:
The development of this game is being livestreamed on Twitch here: Twitch Link

And if you want to find me on Twitter then you can do so here: Twitter Link

My goal is to update the game every other two weeks here on itch.io

The game will be free for now, that you even take your time to try the game is support enough. Also stop by the stream <3
